TextList.OriginalText:
Oh! It's you. You shouldn't scare me
like that.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Oh! It's you. You shouldn't scare me
like that.

TextList.OriginalText:
It's said that she offers a special blessing
to those that visit her... You should go
there and see for yourself.
TextList.TranslatedText:
ว่ากันว่าเธอมอบพรให้กับผู้ที่ไปสักการะ... 
คุณควรลองไปดูนะ

TextList.OriginalText:
in this village. Why not go
rest there until morning?
TextList.TranslatedText:
in this village. Why not go
rest there until morning?

TextList.OriginalText:
My wife...the mother of my children...
she was killed by the
TextList.TranslatedText:
My wife...the mother of my children...
she was killed by the

TextList.OriginalText:
. That is
why Koko now acts as Cottla's mother.
If only... If only I had been able to
stop them...
TextList.TranslatedText:
. That is
why Koko now acts as Cottla's mother.
If only... If only I had been able to
stop them...

TextList.OriginalText:
Oh! Well, if it isn't Master Link.
I'll go back to guarding Lady Impa's
home now.
The
TextList.TranslatedText:
Oh! Well, if it isn't Master Link.
I'll go back to guarding Lady Impa's
home now.
The

TextList.OriginalText:
has been snooping around,
so please be careful, Master Link.
TextList.TranslatedText:
has been snooping around,
so please be careful, Master Link.

TextList.OriginalText:
Master Link...


I've had a lot on my mind lately,
TextList.TranslatedText:
Master Link...


I've had a lot on my mind lately,

TextList.OriginalText:
so it's
been difficult to sleep well.
TextList.TranslatedText:
so it's
been difficult to sleep well.

TextList.OriginalText:
Same for you, I imagine? Well, in any
case, you should get some rest at the
inn when you're tired.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Same for you, I imagine? Well, in any
case, you should get some rest at the
inn when you're tired.

TextList.OriginalText:
I'm off to meet my daughters. I'm going
to tell them stories about our village
under the tree my wife so loved.
My stories are always the same though.
I hope they don't mind!
TextList.TranslatedText:
I'm off to meet my daughters. I'm going
to tell them stories about our village
under the tree my wife so loved.
My stories are always the same though.
I hope they don't mind!

TextList.OriginalText:
My wife used to tell all kinds of stories
under this tree... Now it's up to me to
pass those stories on to our children.
I'm not as good at it as she was,
though...
TextList.TranslatedText:
My wife used to tell all kinds of stories
under this tree... Now it's up to me to
pass those stories on to our children.
I'm not as good at it as she was,
though...

TextList.OriginalText:
Are you taking a break as well,
Master Link? If so, allow me to introduce
my precious daughters, Koko and Cottla.
Any moment I can spend with my girls
is a gift. I always end up boring them
with the same stories, though.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Are you taking a break as well,
Master Link? If so, allow me to introduce
my precious daughters, Koko and Cottla.
Any moment I can spend with my girls
is a gift. I always end up boring them
with the same stories, though.

TextList.OriginalText:
right above this hill,
guarding the Sheikah tribe. Sometimes
from
TextList.TranslatedText:
right above this hill,
guarding the Sheikah tribe. Sometimes
from

TextList.OriginalText:
That's the story I'm telling the
children right now, anyway.
TextList.TranslatedText:
That's the story I'm telling the
children right now, anyway.

TextList.OriginalText:
Actually, the location I speak of is where the
village's
TextList.TranslatedText:
Actually, the location I speak of is where the
village's

TextList.OriginalText:
resides.

But lately monsters have been lurking there,
and it's become quite dangerous.
TextList.TranslatedText:
resides.

But lately monsters have been lurking there,
and it's become quite dangerous.

TextList.OriginalText:
I'm scaring my
daughters so they won't go near that forest...
TextList.TranslatedText:
I'm scaring my
daughters so they won't go near that forest...

TextList.OriginalText:
It works on Koko, but for some reason,
those stories just excite Cottla...
TextList.TranslatedText:
It works on Koko, but for some reason,
those stories just excite Cottla...

TextList.OriginalText:
in this village. Why not go
rest there until the morning?
TextList.TranslatedText:
in this village. Why not go
rest there until the morning?

TextList.OriginalText:
Ha, so that's how it looks! Makes sense.
Please allow me to explain.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Ha, so that's how it looks! Makes sense.
Please allow me to explain.

TextList.OriginalText:
The Sheikah tribe was once quite
technologically advanced.

This outfit I wear was specially made
using Sheikah technology. It keeps the
rain off and also wards off lightning.
I may look soaking wet, but I assure
you, I'm actually quite comfortable.
TextList.TranslatedText:
The Sheikah tribe was once quite
technologically advanced.

This outfit I wear was specially made
using Sheikah technology. It keeps the
rain off and also wards off lightning.
I may look soaking wet, but I assure
you, I'm actually quite comfortable.

TextList.OriginalText:
It's said that she offers a special blessing
to those that visit her... You should go
there and see for yourself.
TextList.TranslatedText:
It's said that she offers a special blessing
to those that visit her... You should go
there and see for yourself.

TextList.OriginalText:
If you need anything, please find it here
in our village.

The
TextList.TranslatedText: ถ้าต้องการอะไร ก็หาดูในหมู่บ้านได้เลย
ร้านขายเสื้อผ้า
ร้านของทั่วไป

TextList.OriginalText:
should be able
to provide everything you need.
Oh, and just between you and me,
there's also a
TextList.TranslatedText:
น่าจะ
มีทุกสิ่งที่คุณต้องการ
อ้อ แล้วก็อย่าไปบอกใครนะ
ยังมี

TextList.OriginalText:
in the hills
of this village.
They say up and behind those hills
resides Kakariko's
TextList.TranslatedText:
บนเนินเขาของ
หมู่บ้านนี้ด้วย
ว่ากันว่าด้านหลังเนินเขานั่นมี
วิญญาณคุ้มครอง

ของหมู่บ้านอาศัยอยู่
ได้ยินมาว่าเธองดงามมาก

TextList.OriginalText:
I'm too intimidated to go see
for myself, though...
TextList.TranslatedText: ฉันก็อยากไปเห็นเธอด้วยตัวเองเหมือนกัน...

TextList.OriginalText:
What are you doing up so late?
Monsters roam about at night. It's way
too dangerous to wander around.
TextList.TranslatedText:
What are you doing up so late?
Monsters roam about at night. It's way
too dangerous to wander around.

TextList.OriginalText:
Are you taking a break as well,
Master Link? If so, allow me to introduce
my precious daughters, Koko and Cottla.
The weather is rather unfortunate today,
but we won't let that bring us down!

Any moment I can spend with my girls
is a gift.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Are you taking a break as well,
Master Link? If so, allow me to introduce
my precious daughters, Koko and Cottla.
The weather is rather unfortunate today,
but we won't let that bring us down!

Any moment I can spend with my girls
is a gift.

TextList.OriginalText:
It's something I make time for
every day, no matter what.
I always end up boring them with the
same stories, though.
TextList.TranslatedText:
It's something I make time for
every day, no matter what.
I always end up boring them with the
